title: What is the future for asset-based welfare?
abstract: The global financial crisis has prompted criticisms of policies such as Labour's Child Trust Fund, and the impending general election raises the question of what the other main parties would do with asset-based welfare. Rajiv Prabhakar examines the likely outcomes
